Description: Load switch / eFuse-lite with programmable current limit + reverse blocking
Notes: Default OFF via EN pulldown. Current limit set by RSET network.

Description: Parallel resistor to increase limit to ~300mA (via solder jumper)

Notes: OPEN=200mA default. CLOSE to enable RSET2 (300mA).
Ensures sensor rail is OFF at boot unless driven.
Optional but recommended for robustness. (GPIO26 / physical 37)
Place close to U_SENS_SW OUT and near sensor connectors.

Nets: 3V3_IN, GND, I2C_SDA, I2C_SCL, ADC_AIN0, ADC_AIN1, ADC_AIN2, ADC_AIN3
Notes: Use for voltage measurement only; place in analog island.
Only if you need to set ADS1115 address; otherwise hard-tie in schematic.
